title: Vessel Monitoring Application
description: This is a project made for vessel owners to monitor the location and view the live/past feed of the vessels.

title: Pizza Ordering Application
description: This is a Pizza menu app made to learn about Flutter and Firebase.

title: Aora

title: Pet Adoption Application
description: This is a pet adoption app with features like google login, adding and managing post, favoriting pets and live chat, it is made to learn React Native development.
